message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,000. Would that work for you?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $10,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
